channel.title: Enums on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Enums on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: ApplicationAreaType
item.description: Indicates where it applies GraphQL Schema definition enum ApplicationAreaType{ HOTEL, ROOM, SERVICE, GENERAL, } Require by Amenity: Something, such as a swimming pool or shopping centre, that is intended to make life more pleasant or comfortable for the people. Media: Contains media information.

item.title: BookStatusType
item.description: Book status GraphQL Schema definition enum BookStatusType{ OK, KO, ON_REQUEST, CANCELLED, UNKNOWN, } Require by HotelBookingDetail: Contains information about booking. HotelCancelDetail: Contains information about cancel

item.title: BookingCriteriaType
item.description: Indicates the type of criteria in the request of the booking list GraphQL Schema definition enum BookingCriteriaType{ DATES, REFERENCES, } Require by HotelCriteriaBookingInput: Criteria of book contains basic information to find a book or books.

item.title: BusinessRulesType
item.description: Business rules type GraphQL Schema definition enum BusinessRulesType{ CHEAPER_AMOUNT, ROOM_TYPE, } Require by BusinessRulesInput: List of business rules to use as filter on the options. BusinessRules: List of business rules to filter the options that you are interested. DefaultSettingsBusinessRulesInput: Input delta price, indicates the price variation permitted by the client before failing the booking.

item.title: CancelPenaltyType
item.description: Options type GraphQL Schema definition enum CancelPenaltyType{ NIGHTS, PERCENT, IMPORT, } Require by CancelPenalty: Contains information about a cancel penalty.

item.title: ChargeType
item.description: Charge Type GraphQL Schema definition enum ChargeType{ INCLUDE, EXCLUDE, } Require by Supplement: Supplement that it can be or its already added to the option returned. Contains all the information about the supplement. Surcharge: Surcharge that it can be or it is already added to the option returned. Contains all the information about the surcharge.

item.title: DateType
item.description: Indicates the type of dates GraphQL Schema definition enum DateType{ ARRIVAL, BOOKING, } Require by CriteriaBookingDatesInput: Criteria by dates

item.title: DescriptionType
item.description: Indicates the type of description GraphQL Schema definition enum DescriptionType{ ADDITIONAL, AMENITY, ACTIVITY, RESTAURANT, ROOM, GENERAL, POOL, LOCATION, HOW_TO_GET, } Require by Description: Object description indicates the type and the description about something.

item.title: DestinationType
item.description: Indicates the type of destination GraphQL Schema definition enum DestinationType{ ZONE, CITY, } Require by DestinationData: Information about destinantion

item.title: DurationType
item.description: Duration Type GraphQL Schema definition enum DurationType{ RANGE, OPEN, } Require by Supplement: Supplement that it can be or its already added to the option returned. Contains all the information about the supplement.

item.title: GroupType
item.description: GraphQL Schema definition enum GroupType{ GROUP, PROFILE, TEAM, FOLDER, PRODUCT, RESOURCE, SPECIFIC_RESOURCE, } Require by OrganizationData: GroupCommonData: GroupData: CreateGroupInput:

item.title: MarkupRuleType
item.description: GraphQL Schema definition enum MarkupRuleType{ PERCENT, IMPORT, } Require by Rule:

item.title: MemberType
item.description: GraphQL Schema definition enum MemberType{ USER, SERVICE_ACCOUNT, } Require by CreateMemberInput:

item.title: Method
item.description: GraphQL Schema definition enum Method{ ADD, DEL, } Require by UpdateMemberInput: UpdateGroupInput:

item.title: PaymentType
item.description: Options payment type GraphQL Schema definition enum PaymentType{ MERCHANT, DIRECT, CARD_BOOKING, CARD_CHECK_IN, } Require by HotelOptionSearch: An option includes hotel information, meal plan, total price, conditions and room description.

item.title: PluginStepType
item.description: Plugin Step Type GraphQL Schema definition enum PluginStepType{ REQUEST, REQUEST_ACCESS, RESPONSE_OPTION, RESPONSE_ACCESS, RESPONSE, } Require by PluginStepInput: Plugin to execute.

item.title: PluginType
item.description: Plugin Type GraphQL Schema definition enum PluginType{ PRE_STEP, HOTEL_MAP, BOARD_MAP, ROOM_MAP, CURRENCY_CONVERSION, MARKUP, AGGREGATION, POST_STEP, } Require by PluginsInput: Plugin to execute.

item.title: PriceType
item.description: Price Type GraphQL Schema definition enum PriceType{ GROSS, NET, AMOUNT, }

item.title: RateRulesType
item.description: Rate Rules GraphQL Schema definition enum RateRulesType{ PACKAGE, OLDER55, OLDER60, OLDER65, CANARY_RESIDENT, BALEARIC_RESIDENT, LARGE_FAMILY, HONEYMOON, PUBLIC_SERVANT, UNEMPLOYED, NORMAL, NON_REFUNDABLE, }

item.title: ServiceApiType
item.description: Services Api available. GraphQL Schema definition enum ServiceApiType{ HOTEL, TRANSPORTATION, CAR, TRANSFERS, ACTIVITIES, VIRTUALACCOUNT, PAYMENT, PACKAGE, }

item.title: ServiceOperationType
item.description: GraphQL Schema definition enum ServiceOperationType{ ALL, SEARCH, QUOTE, BOOKING, OTHER, }

item.title: ServiceType
item.description: Service Type GraphQL Schema definition enum ServiceType{ SKI_PASS, }

item.title: StatsInfoTypes
item.description: GraphQL Schema definition enum StatsInfoTypes{ ALL, OK, INTEGRATION, PROVIDER, COMMUNICATION, HUB, OTHER, } Require by StatsInfo: Details of an specific error

item.title: StatusType
item.description: Options status GraphQL Schema definition enum StatusType{ OK, RQ, } Require by HotelOptionSearch: An option includes hotel information, meal plan, total price, conditions and room description. HotelOptionQuote: Contains information about quote.

item.title: SupplementType
item.description: Supplement Type GraphQL Schema definition enum SupplementType{ SKI_PASS, LESSONS, MEALS, EQUIPMENT, TICKET, TRANSFERS, GALA, ACTIVITY, } Require by Supplement: Supplement that it can be or its already added to the option returned. Contains all the information about the supplement.

item.title: Template
item.description: GraphQL Schema definition enum Template{ FOLDER_DEFAULT, } Require by CreateGroupInput:

item.title: UnitTimeType
item.description: Unit Time Type GraphQL Schema definition enum UnitTimeType{ DAY, HOUR, } Require by Supplement: Supplement that it can be or its already added to the option returned. Contains all the information about the supplement.
